system.description:
At 18th level, if you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.v4pkjilh484jph6i]{Precision Strikes}, you no longer need a bonus action to activate it in conjunction with a crossbow, geared slingshot, or firearm.  
If you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.okthtwyohmh0eoa5]{Mystic Apprentice}, you have instead found a way to blend mundane technology and magic in a way that uses the former to enhance the latter, adding your Intelligence modifier to a single damage roll for any cantrip you cast. In addition, if you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-feats.Item.fs2rwplugvwip86h]{Crossbow Expertise}, casting a cantrip that deals damage counts as taking the attack action in order to allow an off-hand attack with a hand crossbow or one handed firearm.
